name: Orc Triath

attributes.attribute: magical Boar owned by the goddess Brigit

sources: Monaghan, Patricia. The Encyclopedia of Celtic Mythology and Folklore. Checkmark Books, 2008.
text: Irish mythology has a creature known as Orc Triath which is equivalent to the Welsh Twrch Trwyth. It is a magical Boar that belonged to the goddess Brigit.
